author: azwarrangkuti
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Last 16
body:
<center>https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png</center>


I want to share about my prediction in the @blocktrades world cup for the round of 16. If you want to follow the contest, you can go [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

This is my selection for the matches for the round of 16

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | France | vs | Argentina | 2
1 | Uruguay | vs | Portugal | 1
2 | Spain | vs | Russia | 0
3 | Croatia | vs | Denmark | 1
2 | Brazil | vs | Mexico | 0
3 | Belgium | vs | Japan | 0
1 | Sweden | vs | Switzerland |1
1 | Colombia | vs | England | 2

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as [witness here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as [witness here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: jasiu
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Last 16
